comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to New-York tribune., August 06, 1915, Page 14, Column 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-08-06/ed-... E. J. Deering was " a business agent for the local machinists organization" -- local being local to the Bliss plant in Brooklyn.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This explains why Bain had the preceding Biiss factory photos. I've linked another article under one that further explains the labor troubles there and Deering's involvement.
